description: Android device screen mirroring in VS Code
config.scrcpy.path: Path to scrcpy installation directory (leave empty to use PATH)
config.scrcpy.maxSize: Maximum screen dimension (width or height) in pixels
config.scrcpy.maxFps.15: 15 FPS - Low frame rate, saves bandwidth
config.scrcpy.screenOff: Turn device screen off while mirroring (saves battery)
config.scrcpy.showTouches: Show visual touch feedback on device screen
config.scrcpy.lockVideoOrientation: Lock video orientation to current rotation (disables auto-rotate)
config.scrcpy.audio: Enable audio streaming from device (requires scrcpy 2.0+)
config.scrcpy.showStats: Show FPS and frame count statistics overlay
config.scrcpy.clipboardSync: Automatically sync clipboard between host and device
config.scrcpy.screenshotSavePath: Default folder for saving screenshots. Leave empty to use the Downloads folder.
config.scrcpy.screenshotShowSaveDialog: Show save dialog instead of saving directly to the default folder
config.scrcpy.apkInstallDefaultPath: Default folder for the APK file picker. Leave empty to use the Downloads folder.
config.scrcpy.autoConnect: Automatically connect to devices when they are plugged in
config.scrcpy.autoReconnect: Automatically attempt to reconnect when connection is lost
config.scrcpy.reconnectRetries: Number of reconnection attempts before showing error. *Only applies when `#scrcpy.autoReconnect#` is enabled.*
command.connectWifi: Scrcpy: Connect to Device over WiFi
